dict.acceptation: 值得的；有…的价值；等值的；有…的财产；

sent.trans: （或How much is it worth？）这值多少钱？

sent.orig: The word "worth" can be construed with a gerund in active voice.
sent.trans: “worth”一词可与主动语态的动名语连用。

sent.orig: Worth was the last major stop for rest and supplies.
sent.trans: Worth镇是最后一个主要供人们休息和提供日用品的地方。

sent.orig: The worth of labourer consists of individual social worth and individual self-worth.
sent.trans: 劳动者的价值包括个人的社会价值与个人的自我价值。

sent.orig: Absolutely. The dollar becomes worth less. -Worth less. Not worthless, but worth less.
sent.trans: 当然。美元变得价值更低。-价值更低。不是没有价值，而是价值更低。
